extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Sweet Snacks;Frozen;Baking
extendedIngredients.name: caramels

recipes.title: Healthy Homemade Take 5 Candy Bars (all natural, low sugar, gluten free, vegan)
recipes.instructions: Melt the chocolate and spoon into 5 chocolate molds.  Maneuver the mold around so the chocolate reaches all around the mold to create "walls."Sprinkle each cavity with peanuts and refrigerate for ~30 minutes, or until firm.Press a caramel into each cavity, spread the peanut butter over the caramels, then press the pretzels into the peanut butter.Spoon the rest of the chocolate over the pretzels in each cavity and refrigerate for ~45 minutes, or until completely firm.  They are ready to serve!

steps.step: Melt the chocolate and spoon into 5 chocolate molds.  Maneuver the mold around so the chocolate reaches all around the mold to create "walls."Sprinkle each cavity with peanuts and refrigerate for ~30 minutes, or until firm.Press a caramel into each cavity, spread the peanut butter over the caramels, then press the pretzels into the peanut butter.Spoon the rest of the chocolate over the pretzels in each cavity and refrigerate for ~45 minutes, or until completely firm.  They are ready to serve!
